info.title: Voucherify API
info.description: Voucherify promotion engine REST API. Please see https://docs.voucherify.io/docs for more details.

delete.description:
Removes the holder from a referral card. You can remove a referee only.

To use this endpoint, you must have the following permissions:
- Create and modify Customers and Segments (`customers.modify`)
- Publish Voucher (`vouchers.publish`)

> ðŸ“˜ Alternative endpoint
>
>This endpoint is an alternative to the [Remove Referral Card Holder endpoint](ref:referrals-remove-holder-1). The URL was re-designed to retrieve the referral member holders without providing the `campaignId` as a path paremeter.

204.description: Returns no content if removal is successful.

403.description: Returns an error if the user is missing permissions or is trying to remove the referrer.

value.details: User does not have a required permission to perform this operation.
You can not remove Referrer assignment

404.description: Returns an error if a resource cannot be found.

value.details: Cannot find redeemable_holder with id rh_0f1ab744ce8277d0dc

request_id.description: This ID is useful when troubleshooting and/or finding the root cause of an error response by our support team.

resource_id.description: Unique resource ID that can be used in another endpoint to get more details.

error.description: Includes additional information about the error.

message.description: The message configured by the user in a validation rule.
